check.name: IllegalSymbol
check.description:
Checks that specified symbols (by Unicode code points or ranges) are not used in code.

Rationale: This check helps prevent emoji symbols in code, enforce ASCII-only source files, or forbid specific Unicode characters.

property.name: asciiOnly
property.description: Control whether only ASCII characters are allowed.

property.name: symbolCodes
property.description: Specify the symbols to check for. Format: comma-separated list of hex codes or ranges (e.g., "0x2705, 0xd83c-0xd83e").
